metadata.title: Antiviral reactivities of cd T cells

abstract.original_text: The complex antiviral immune mechanisms involve both adaptive and innate reactions mediated by cd T lymphocytes, whose unique immunosurveillance contributions are analyzed here in different clinical and experimental settings. It is beyond any doubt that the fast, potent, cytotoxic as well as non-cytolytic antiviral activities of cd T cells are critical in protecting the host against diverse viral pathogens.

sentences.segment_text: The complex antiviral immune mechanisms involve both adaptive and innate reactions mediated by cd T lymphocytes ,
whose unique immunosurveillance contributions are analyzed here in different clinical and experimental settings .
It is beyond any doubt that the fast ,
potent , cytotoxic as well as non-cytolytic antiviral activities of cd T cells are critical in protecting the host against diverse viral pathogens .
